column4: You know I've got to wonder why I'm in two linux channels, am fairly comfortable with UNIX, but am still using windows.
Haha
just ditch windows and come to the light side
that's normal. Gentoo uses too much time compiling to ever get to do anything else
well actually I like gentoo, believe it or not. I like ubuntu too, of course, that's what I run on my laptop.
I always kept a win32 partition around because I have some teachers at my school who go completely whacko if there's any indication you did a project in anything other than windows.
heh
ewwwww
